about_the_game:
Welcome to Banana Next Gen, a thrilling 2D/3D side-scroller that takes you on a wild and unpredictable journey inside the perilous castle of the Banana King! You play as a brave, enslaved banana - Ben Nana, determined to escape the clutches of the tyrannical Banana King and rescue your family from his cruel reign. Combining precision-based gameplay with a quirky, humor-filled narrative, Banana Next Gen offers a unique and challenging (or casual) experience that is as addictive as it is fun.

A Tale of Bananas and Tyranny

The Banana Kingdom was once a peaceful place where bananas lived free and happy. But the power-hungry Banana King has taken control, enslaving all the bananas—including you and your family. Trapped inside his castle, you must face the King's dangerous traps, navigate deadly obstacles, and outsmart the cruel ruler to secure your freedom. Each of the 15 levels represents a new area of the castle, filled with treacherous challenges that will test your reflexes and skills. Will you be able to free your fellow bananas and defeat the Banana King once and for all?

Gameplay that’s Totally Bananas!

In Banana Next Gen, you’ll master a unique control system where you launch your banana by clicking where you want to go. Or use a controller, aim with your thumbstick, and launch away with your trigger! Precision is key as you fly through each level, dodging obstacles, collecting banana coins, and unlocking new areas of the Banana King’s castle. Along the way, you’ll need to find hidden golden bananas to unlock secret levels and advance through the game.

But watch out! The castle is full of dangerous traps designed by the Banana King to stop you in your tracks. You’ll have to stay sharp and think fast if you want to collect enough banana coins and golden bananas! When you finally reach the throne room, you’ll face the ultimate challenge: an epic showdown with the Banana King himself.

Key Features:

Innovative Controls: Launch your banana by clicking in the direction you want to fly, creating a unique and engaging gameplay mechanic that keeps you on your toes.

15 Challenging Levels: Explore the dark and treacherous corridors of the Banana King’s castle.

Collect Banana Coins and Golden Bananas: Gather banana coins to unlock new levels and paths. Search for hidden golden bananas to unlock secret challenges and content.

Epic Boss Battle: Confront the tyrannical Banana King in an intense final boss battle that will test everything you’ve learned along the way.

Humor and Charm: Banana Next Gen delivers a quirky, humor-filled adventure that doesn't take itself too seriously—it's bananas in the best way possible!

A Battle for Freedom

Each level of Banana Next Gen is more than just a challenge—it’s a step closer to freedom. As you progress, you’ll uncover more of the Banana King’s evil plans, and with each level you clear, you’ll be one step closer to facing him in an epic final battle. Can you outsmart the Banana King and free your family, or will you remain a prisoner in his twisted castle forever?

Join the Adventure!

Whether you’re a casual gamer or a side-scroller enthusiast, Banana Next Gen promises a fun and engaging experience for all. With its easy-to-learn, hard-to-master gameplay, vibrant art style, and unforgettable banana-themed adventure, this game will keep you coming back for more.

name: Banana Next Gen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 7th gen or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Banana Next Gen is a fun-filled 2D/3D side-scroller where you control a flying banana trapped in the Banana King's castle. Collect coins, unlock levels, and face the tyrannical Banana King in an epic final showdown. Can you save your family and escape?
